thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 4 of 3619
thread.title: Elizabeth

author: Elizabeth
title: Elizabeth
text: I ordered my first three books from Thrift (books i haven't been able to find at my local bookstores or that national chain). Enjoying reading them. But then Thrift sent me an email with recommendations, and all of the books recommended were books i already read but really loved. I was very impressed that the site can recommend books that i know i will like based on my purchases. I look forward to my next books from Thrift.
